attributes.action: End Abuse and Torture in the Western World
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People often talk about human rights abuse in distant parts of the world, but it is clear that abuse and even torture does happen in the West.  It happens anywhere where their is a lack of openness.  It happens anywhere where people free to operate behind closed doors.  The goverment must take action to deter abuse and torture and to make these things difficult if not impossible to do without being found out.
